hedline.hl1: Court TV Makes Selection of New Shop

abstract.p: Court TV names Hampel/Stefanides, part of Envoy Communications Group, as its advertising agency; billings estimated at $14 million (S)

block.p: Court TV, which is owned by the Time Warner Entertainment unit of Time Warner and the Liberty Media Corporation, said yesterday that it had named Hampel/Stefanides in New York, part of the Envoy Communications Group, as its advertising agency of record, responsible for all strategic, creative and media work.

Court TV, which is owned by the Time Warner Entertainment unit of Time Warner and the Liberty Media Corporation, said yesterday that it had named Hampel/Stefanides in New York, part of the Envoy Communications Group, as its advertising agency of record, responsible for all strategic, creative and media work.

Betsy Vorce, a spokeswoman at Court TV in New York, said the decision came after a three-month review had narrowed the candidates to Hampel/Stefanides and two other finalists in New York: the incumbent of more than three years, Griffin Bacal, which is part of the Omnicom Group, and DeVito/Verdi.
